name: <iter::adapters::copied::Copied<I> as iter::traits::double_ended::DoubleEndedIterator>::try_rfold
src:
fn try_rfold<B, F, R>(&mut self, init: B, f: F) -> R
    where
        Self: Sized,
        F: FnMut(B, Self::Item) -> R,
        R: Try<Output = B>,
    {
        self.it.try_rfold(init, copy_try_fold(f))
    }
